dr.evolution.tree
Class FlexibleNode

java.lang.Object
  dr.evolution.tree.FlexibleNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
NodeRef, Attributable, java.io.Serializable
public class FlexibleNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements NodeRef, Attributable

A flexible implementation of the Node interface. Can have both node heights and node lengths. Note that the height and length are not garenteed to both be correct. Which is currently in use and the conversion between them is handled by FlexibleTree.

Version:
$Id: FlexibleNode.java,v 1.9 2005/06/20 16:06:02 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut, Alexei Drummond
See Also:
Serialized Form
